Simple Blocking Access to Gambling Sites.
The Gambling Blocker Chrome extension helps users stay focused by preventing access to gambling websites.
We understand how important it can be to limit yourself from playing at casinos sometimes, which is why we created this blocker and regularly update the casino database.
The Gambling Blocker Chrome extension helps users stay focused by preventing access to gambling websites. Displays custom warnings when attempting to access blocked sites, and ensures compatibility with the latest Chrome versions. 
Ideal for individuals seeking to limit distractions and maintain productivity online.
